well i am from sweden,but i live in thailand since 2009.....  

I have used this nick since 11 of sep 2001 ,to pay respect to the people who died in WTC.


, i belive i started to use this nickname on paltalk.

And then the Dc hubs for a very long time,. If u been on dc hubs,probably mabe you are familiar with the nick *Vitnos* ,,, 

When i came to thailand i created a new nickname *THe Thai Bkk Eagle* or my other short version for it as a shorter nick *TTBE*.

..........
But today i use my old nick i started with 2001. Prior this year i used vitnos alot , but some dc hubs i still continue to use vitnos until few years ago.(White-nose).And my former wife used *Svartnos* (Black-nose).  

My wife Maria Alias *Svartnos*Black-Nose* died at a shopping mall 14:th of may 2007 and 4 month pregnancy,baby died also. When the ambulance arrived to the shopping mall then it was to late save her life,even that the ambulance was there within 8 minutes,i still was to late......

*****
The word on internet spread like fire in the wind of this tragedy through every dc-hub in sweden,my wife had lots of dc friends,.

**********
At the funeral i got really surprised,some of her dc friends came to the funeral without my knowing, with flowers lot of flowers Black and red roses , . They had raised money to buy flowers from dc friends,

I promise you , it was not just 1 flower,i am pretty sure it was well over 2000 roses sent buy her dc friends.
.......
Now,this belongs to the past,the future is ahead.I have a new wife since 2009 when i arrived to thailand , i'm 44 and she is 50,but sure is a good wife even if she's little bit to old.

But i love her moore than anything ells in this world,.

Stoiry of my life )))
........
Well good luck for the future , I'm glad you have a new life , even though your past has been sad .
